messages.subject: The difference is...
messages.msgSnippet: A quote from a post to an authenticity list about using a library to do research for one s SCA persona: -=-Have fun and beware of the sidetracking entity that
messages.messageBody:
A quote from a post to an authenticity list about using a library to
do research for one's SCA persona:

-=-Have fun and beware of the sidetracking entity that lives in your
brain! Or don't...-=-

People will apologize for poking around in a dictionary when they go
to look up a word. Someone did it at my house a week ago.



Without having seen what's above, I wrote this to a 17 year old boy
in England who found my site (the food section, mostly) and was
writing to chat about whether he should go to the university:


> I think going to college can offer way more than just the coursework,
> as you probably know. You'll meet friends you'll probably have for
> life. Try to keep the debt reasonable and don't limit your options.
> Take classes you "don't have to take." Do community things--free
> this or that, plays, non-computer-geek stuff on the side. Become a
> sponge to soak it all in, instead of an arrow speeding toward one
> goal.
>
> Be open to changes of plans!
> Be open to the world.
>
> Sandra
>

Sandra

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
